subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Raja Rai Singh?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राजा राय सिंह ने किया गया किस महमूल को?
explanation_en: Amer Fort was built by Raja Man Singh I of Kumbhalgarh.
explanation_hi: राजा मन्सिंग एक्स के आधार पर कम्बलगढ़ में बना गया पुलींग एस के आधार पर गैरा।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Sarhind Princely State was annexed by the British Raj in 1845?
question_hi: 1845 में British Raj ने Sarhind निमोर देश को कैने के आधार पर ????
explanation_en: Sarhind-II, also known as Sirhind, was annexed by the British Raj in 1845.
explanation_hi: 1845 में British Raj ने Sirhind, उसके आधार पर ????
